abilities.name: tiny_avalanche
abilities.title: Avalanche
abilities.detail: Bombards an area with rocks, stunning and damaging enemy land units.

abilities.name: tiny_toss
abilities.title: Toss
abilities.detail: Grabs a random unit in a 275 radius around Tiny, friend or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.  If the tossed unit is an enemy, it will take an extra 20% damage. Toss does more damage as Tiny's size increases.

abilities.name: tiny_craggy_exterior
abilities.title: Craggy Exterior
abilities.detail: Causes damage to bounce back on Tiny's attackers.  Enemies that attack Tiny from within 300 units have a chance of being stunned.

abilities.name: tiny_grow
abilities.title: Grow
abilities.detail:
Tiny gains craggy mass that increases his power at the cost of his attack speed. Increases Tossed unit damage and improves movement speed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: sven_storm_bolt
abilities.title: Storm Hammer
abilities.detail: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.

abilities.name: sven_great_cleave
abilities.title: Great Cleave
abilities.detail: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.

abilities.name: sven_warcry
abilities.title: Warcry
abilities.detail: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 7 seconds.

abilities.name: sven_gods_strength
abilities.title: God's Strength
abilities.detail: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds.

abilities.name: earthshaker_fissure
abilities.title: Fissure
abilities.detail: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, fissuring the earth while stunning and damaging enemy units in a line.  Creates an impassable ridge of stone.

abilities.name: earthshaker_enchant_totem
abilities.title: Enchant Totem
abilities.detail: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.

abilities.name: earthshaker_aftershock
abilities.title: Aftershock
abilities.detail: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.

abilities.name: earthshaker_echo_slam
abilities.title: Echo Slam
abilities.detail:
Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: kunkka_torrent
abilities.title: Torrent
abilities.detail: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: kunkka_tidebringer
abilities.title: Tidebringer
abilities.detail: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.

abilities.name: kunkka_x_marks_the_spot
abilities.title: X Marks the Spot
abilities.detail: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration.

abilities.name: kunkka_ghostship
abilities.title: Ghostship
abilities.detail: Summons a ghostship to cut a swath through battle, causing damage and stuns to enemy units as it crashes through. Allies are doused in Kunkka's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to damage.

abilities.name: kunkka_return
abilities.title: Return
abilities.detail: Returns the marked hero to the X.

abilities.name: beastmaster_wild_axes
abilities.title: Wild Axes
abilities.detail: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once.

abilities.name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild
abilities.title: Call of the Wild
abilities.detail:
Beastmaster calls a watchful Hawk.  Previous summons are removed upon casting.

Level 1: Summons a Scout Hawk.
Level 2: Summons a Scout Hawk.
Level 3: Summons a Greater Hawk.
Level 4: Summons a Greater Hawk.

abilities.name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar
abilities.title: Call of the Wild
abilities.detail:
Beastmaster calls a powerful Boar.  Previous summons are removed upon casting.

Level 1: Not Available.
Level 2: Summons a Lesser Boar.
Level 3: Summons a Lesser Boar.
Level 4: Summons a Greater Boar.

abilities.name: beastmaster_inner_beast
abilities.title: Inner Beast
abilities.detail: Untaps the inner fury of allies, passively increasing their attack speed.

abilities.name: beastmaster_primal_roar
abilities.title: Primal Roar
abilities.detail:
A deafening roar that deals damage and stuns the target enemy unit, while opening a path between Beastmaster and his prey. Nearby enemies also take damage and have their movement speed and attack rate reduced.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: dragon_knight_breathe_fire
abilities.title: Breathe Fire
abilities.detail: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.

abilities.name: dragon_knight_dragon_tail
abilities.title: Dragon Tail
abilities.detail: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.

abilities.name: dragon_knight_dragon_blood
abilities.title: Dragon Blood
abilities.detail: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

abilities.name: dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form
abilities.title: Elder Dragon Form
abilities.detail:
Dragon Knight can take the form of three powerful elder dragons.
LEVEL 1 - Green Dragon: Short poison damage over time on attack.
LEVEL 2 - Red Dragon: Splash damage on attack.
LEVEL 3 - Blue Dragon: Splash damage and frost attack that slows enemy units.

abilities.name: rattletrap_battery_assault
abilities.title: Battery Assault
abilities.detail: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.

abilities.name: rattletrap_power_cogs
abilities.title: Power Cogs
abilities.detail: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemies in 3 attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.

abilities.name: rattletrap_rocket_flare
abilities.title: Rocket Flare
abilities.detail: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: rattletrap_hookshot
abilities.title: Hookshot
abilities.detail:
Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a non-neutral unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are subject to damage and stunned. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: omniknight_purification
abilities.title: Purification
abilities.detail: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: omniknight_repel
abilities.title: Repel
abilities.detail: Creates a powerful divine ward that blocks most magic from affecting a target unit.

abilities.name: omniknight_degen_aura
abilities.title: Degen Aura
abilities.detail: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.

abilities.name: omniknight_guardian_angel
abilities.title: Guardian Angel
abilities.detail:
Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage and greatly increases hit point regeneration of nearby allies.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter

abilities.name: huskar_inner_vitality
abilities.title: Inner Vitality
abilities.detail: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 40% it will heal faster.  Lasts 16 seconds.

abilities.name: huskar_burning_spear
abilities.title: Burning Spear
abilities.detail:
Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.  Lasts 7 seconds.

Burning Spears is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: huskar_berserkers_blood
abilities.title: Berserker's Blood
abilities.detail: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and magic resistance based on missing health.

abilities.name: huskar_life_break
abilities.title: Life Break
abilities.detail:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to inflict a percentage of that hero's current HP, and slow at the cost of his own vitality.  While leaping, Huskar is magic immune.  Slow lasts 5 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: brewmaster_thunder_clap
abilities.title: Thunder Clap
abilities.detail: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units.

abilities.name: brewmaster_drunken_haze
abilities.title: Drunken Haze
abilities.detail: Drenches a small area in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced, and causing their attacks to have a chance to miss.

abilities.name: brewmaster_drunken_brawler
abilities.title: Drunken Brawler
abilities.detail: Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage.

abilities.name: brewmaster_primal_split
abilities.title: Primal Split
abilities.detail:
Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: treant_natures_guise
abilities.title: Nature's Guise
abilities.detail: Causes the targeted unit to blend in with the forest, becoming invisible to enemies and gaining a movement speed bonus when near a tree.  If the unit moves away from a tree or the spell is cast on a unit with no nearby trees, Nature's Guise is lost.  Treant Protector can cast spells and remain invisible under Nature's Guise.

abilities.name: treant_leech_seed
abilities.title: Leech Seed
abilities.detail: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it equal to the amount drained.  Pulses 6 times.

abilities.name: treant_living_armor
abilities.title: Living Armor
abilities.detail: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which grants bonus regeneration. Also blocks some damage from all sources . Dispels when a number of damage instances are taken.

abilities.name: treant_overgrowth
abilities.title: Overgrowth
abilities.detail: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.

abilities.name: alchemist_acid_spray
abilities.title: Acid Spray
abilities.detail: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take mixed damage per second and have their armor reduced.

abilities.name: alchemist_unstable_concoction
abilities.title: Unstable Concoction
abilities.detail: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 7 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.

abilities.name: alchemist_goblins_greed
abilities.title: Greevil's Greed
abilities.detail: Alchemist gets bonus gold for killing creeps; the bonus stacks if the creeps are killed within a period of time, after which the count is reset.  The bonus gold is capped at 30 gold.

abilities.name: alchemist_chemical_rage
abilities.title: Chemical Rage
abilities.detail: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.

abilities.name: alchemist_unstable_concoction_throw
abilities.title: Unstable Concoction Throw
abilities.detail: Throw it before it blows up!

abilities.name: centaur_hoof_stomp
abilities.title: Hoof Stomp
abilities.detail: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: centaur_double_edge
abilities.title: Double Edge
abilities.detail: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target.  Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.

abilities.name: centaur_return
abilities.title: Return
abilities.detail: Centaur immediately counters every attack, damaging the attacker based on a percentage of Centaur's strength.

abilities.name: centaur_stampede
abilities.title: Stampede
abilities.detail: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and slow enemy units they tread upon. Each enemy can be trampled once and takes damage based on the Warrunner's strength.

abilities.name: bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo
abilities.title: Viscous Nasal Goo
abilities.detail: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.

abilities.name: bristleback_quill_spray
abilities.title: Quill Spray
abilities.detail: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback.  Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.

abilities.name: bristleback_bristleback
abilities.title: Bristleback
abilities.detail: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes 250 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

abilities.name: bristleback_warpath
abilities.title: Warpath
abilities.detail: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.  The first stack (base) provides larger bonuses.

abilities.name: shredder_whirling_death
abilities.title: Whirling Death
abilities.detail: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal Pure damage if a tree is cut down in the process.

abilities.name: shredder_timber_chain
abilities.title: Timber Chain
abilities.detail: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.

abilities.name: shredder_reactive_armor
abilities.title: Reactive Armor
abilities.detail: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor.

abilities.name: shredder_chakram
abilities.title: Chakram
abilities.detail: Fires your main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Additionally, for each 5% of health missing, enemies caught in the saw blade move more slowly. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.

abilities.name: shredder_return_chakram
abilities.title: Return Chakram
abilities.detail: Returns the Chakram to Timbersaw.

abilities.name: tusk_ice_shards
abilities.title: Ice Shards
abilities.detail: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. If the ball comes in contact with an enemy hero or reaches its maximum range the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: tusk_snowball
abilities.title: Snowball
abilities.detail: Tusk and any nearby allied heroes roll in a quickly growing snowball towards the target enemy unit. Any victims caught in the snowball's path take damage and are briefly stunned; the final target takes extra damage and extra stun duration.  The snowball moves at a percentage of Tusk's current movement speed.

abilities.name: tusk_frozen_sigil
abilities.title: Frozen Sigil
abilities.detail: Tusk summons a Frozen Sigil by calling upon the deepest cold of winter. The Sigil creates a snowstorm which slows all enemy units within 600 range.

abilities.name: tusk_walrus_punch
abilities.title: Walrus PUNCH!
abilities.detail: Tusk prepares his mighty Walrus Punch; his next attack will do a critical strike and launch the victim into the air. The victim will be slowed upon landing and take damage.  More damage is dealt if the target is below a certain percentage of HP.

abilities.name: antimage_mana_break
abilities.title: Mana Break
abilities.detail:
Burns an opponent's mana on each attack.  Mana Break deals 60% of the mana burned as damage to the target.

Mana Break is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: antimage_blink
abilities.title: Blink
abilities.detail: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

abilities.name: antimage_spell_shield
abilities.title: Spell Shield
abilities.detail: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.

abilities.name: antimage_mana_void
abilities.title: Mana Void
abilities.detail: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.

abilities.name: elder_titan_echo_stomp
abilities.title: Echo Stomp
abilities.detail: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.  Unconscious enemies will wake if they take damage.

abilities.name: elder_titan_ancestral_spirit
abilities.title: Astral Spirit
abilities.detail:
Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through.  When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage and movement speed for each unit it damaged.

The Astral Spirit possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.

abilities.name: elder_titan_natural_order
abilities.title: Natural Order
abilities.detail: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic resistance from nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: elder_titan_return_spirit
abilities.title: Return Astral Spirit
abilities.detail: Returns the Astral Spirit to Elder Titan.

abilities.name: elder_titan_earth_splitter
abilities.title: Earth Splitter
abilities.detail: Sends forth a jagged crack in front of Elder Titan.  After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing them while dealing damage based on the maximum life of units caught in the area.

abilities.name: drow_ranger_frost_arrows
abilities.title: Frost Arrows
abilities.detail:
Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement.  Lasts 1.5 seconds on Heroes, and 7 seconds on creeps.

Frost Arrows is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.

abilities.name: drow_ranger_silence
abilities.title: Silence
abilities.detail: Stops all enemy units in a target area from casting spells.

abilities.name: drow_ranger_trueshot
abilities.title: Precision Aura
abilities.detail: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied Hero units on the map based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.

abilities.name: drow_ranger_marksmanship
abilities.title: Marksmanship
abilities.detail: Drow's experiences in battle improve her accuracy and effectiveness in combat, providing a passive bonus to Agility. Grants no bonus if there are enemy heroes within a 400 AoE.

abilities.name: juggernaut_blade_fury
abilities.title: Blade Fury
abilities.detail: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.

abilities.name: juggernaut_healing_ward
abilities.title: Healing Ward
abilities.detail: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points.  The Healing Ward can move at 450 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.

abilities.name: juggernaut_blade_dance
abilities.title: Blade Dance
abilities.detail: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.

abilities.name: juggernaut_omni_slash
abilities.title: Omnislash
abilities.detail:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 175-250 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: mirana_starfall
abilities.title: Starstorm
abilities.detail: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. One random enemy unit in 175 range will take a second hit for 75% of the damage.

abilities.name: mirana_arrow
abilities.title: Sacred Arrow
abilities.detail: Fires an arrow with deadly precision, dealing large damage and stunning the first enemy unit it strikes. Stun duration increases based on distance to target, ranging from 0.5 to 5 seconds. Bonus damage up to 100 is applied based on distance to target.

abilities.name: mirana_leap
abilities.title: Leap
abilities.detail: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar upon landing, granting attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.

abilities.name: mirana_invis
abilities.title: Moonlight Shadow
abilities.detail: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If Invisibility is broken, it will restore after fade delay if the shadow's duration has not expired.  Silence will stop Moonlight Shadow.

abilities.name: morphling_waveform
abilities.title: Waveform
abilities.detail: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.

abilities.name: morphling_adaptive_strike
abilities.title: Adaptive Strike
abilities.detail: Strikes an enemy unit with a blast of water. If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, it deals the maximum damage and the minimum stun. If strength is 50% higher, it deals the maximum stun and minimum damage.

abilities.name: morphling_morph_agi
abilities.title: Morph (Agility Gain)
abilities.detail: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.

abilities.name: morphling_morph_str
abilities.title: Morph (Strength Gain)
abilities.detail: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Strength.

abilities.name: morphling_replicate
abilities.title: Replicate
abilities.detail: Morphling replicates any hero, friend or foe, although only dealing 50% the original hero's damage.  At any time, Morphling can instantly take the position of the Replicate.

abilities.name: morphling_morph_replicate
abilities.title: Morph Replicate
abilities.detail: Morphling switches into his replication, instantly taking its position.

abilities.name: phantom_lancer_spirit_lance
abilities.title: Spirit Lance
abilities.detail: Casts a magical spirit lance on a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while a Phantom is summoned to attack the unit.

abilities.name: phantom_lancer_doppelwalk
abilities.title: Doppelwalk
abilities.detail: Renders Phantom Lancer invisible, while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies.

abilities.name: phantom_lancer_juxtapose
abilities.title: Juxtapose
abilities.detail: Phantom Lancer's attacks have a chance to create illusions to confuse enemies.  Phantom Lancer himself counts as one towards the max images.

abilities.name: phantom_lancer_phantom_edge
abilities.title: Phantom Edge
abilities.detail: Phantom Lancer hones his abilities.  Improves chance of Juxtaposing, and the Juxtapose illusions can now create their own illusions.  Phantom Edge also increases Phantom Lancer's magic resistance.

abilities.name: vengefulspirit_magic_missile
abilities.title: Magic Missile
abilities.detail: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

abilities.name: vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror
abilities.title: Wave of Terror
abilities.detail: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path.

abilities.name: vengefulspirit_command_aura
abilities.title: Vengeance Aura
abilities.detail: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases nearby friendly units' physical damage.

abilities.name: vengefulspirit_nether_swap
abilities.title: Nether Swap
abilities.detail:
Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy.  Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: sniper_shrapnel
abilities.title: Shrapnel
abilities.detail: Fires a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area.

abilities.name: sniper_headshot
abilities.title: Headshot
abilities.detail: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving a chance to deal extra damage and mini-stun. Headshot procs cannot be evaded.

abilities.name: sniper_take_aim
abilities.title: Take Aim
abilities.detail: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle.

abilities.name: sniper_assassinate
abilities.title: Assassinate
abilities.detail: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit, and after 1.7 seconds, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range, and mini-stuns the target.

abilities.name: templar_assassin_refraction
abilities.title: Refraction
abilities.detail: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage while gaining a bonus to her damage.  These effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances

abilities.name: templar_assassin_meld
abilities.title: Meld
abilities.detail: Templar Assassin conceals herself, gaining invisibility while remaining still.  On the next attacked enemy unit, Lanaya will reduce its armor and deal bonus damage to it.

abilities.name: templar_assassin_psi_blades
abilities.title: Psi Blades
abilities.detail: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range.

abilities.name: templar_assassin_trap
abilities.title: Trap
abilities.detail: Springs the nearest trap, slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: templar_assassin_psionic_trap
abilities.title: Psionic Trap
abilities.detail: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung, at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30% in the area. Traps charge up to slow more by 5% for each second up to 50%.

abilities.name: riki_smoke_screen
abilities.title: Smoke Screen
abilities.detail: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing and slowing enemy units in an area while causing them to miss on most attacks.  Lasts 6 seconds.

abilities.name: riki_blink_strike
abilities.title: Blink Strike
abilities.detail: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

abilities.name: riki_backstab
abilities.title: Backstab
abilities.detail: If Riki attacks from behind, bonus damage is applied based on his current agility.

abilities.name: riki_permanent_invisibility
abilities.title: Permanent Invisibility
abilities.detail: Riki fades into the shadows, staying permanently invisible except while attacking.  While silenced, Riki will be visible.

abilities.name: bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss
abilities.title: Shuriken Toss
abilities.detail: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.

abilities.name: bounty_hunter_jinada
abilities.title: Jinada
abilities.detail: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.

abilities.name: bounty_hunter_wind_walk
abilities.title: Shadow Walk
abilities.detail: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: bounty_hunter_track
abilities.title: Track
abilities.detail: Tracks an enemy hero, giving True Sight of it and grants a gain in movement speed to allies near the hunted. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bounty in gold.

abilities.name: luna_lucent_beam
abilities.title: Lucent Beam
abilities.detail: Luna channels a concentrated beam of lunar energy at an enemy, stunning and dealing damage.

abilities.name: luna_moon_glaive
abilities.title: Moon Glaive
abilities.detail: Allows Luna's glaive to bounce to enemy units near the attacked unit. Each bounce deals less damage.

abilities.name: luna_lunar_blessing
abilities.title: Lunar Blessing
abilities.detail: Grants bonus damage to nearby allies, while blessing Luna with extra night vision.

abilities.name: luna_eclipse
abilities.title: Eclipse
abilities.detail:
Calls an eclipse that follows Luna, striking units with her current level of Lucent Beam.  A single target can only be hit a maximum times.  Unlike individual Lucent Beams, Eclipse does not stun.  Eclipse turns day into night for 10 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: ursa_earthshock
abilities.title: Earthshock
abilities.detail: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: ursa_overpower
abilities.title: Overpower
abilities.detail: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.

abilities.name: ursa_fury_swipes
abilities.title: Fury Swipes
abilities.detail:
Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

Fury Swipes is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: ursa_enrage
abilities.title: Enrage
abilities.detail: Ursa goes into a frenzy, gaining a percentage of his current health as bonus damage. Lasts 15 seconds.

abilities.name: gyrocopter_rocket_barrage
abilities.title: Rocket Barrage
abilities.detail: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: gyrocopter_homing_missile
abilities.title: Homing Missile
abilities.detail: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target.  Homing Missile deals greater damage the further it has traveled.  Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.

abilities.name: gyrocopter_flak_cannon
abilities.title: Flak Cannon
abilities.detail: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts 15 seconds or until the attacks are used.

abilities.name: gyrocopter_call_down
abilities.title: Call Down
abilities.detail:
Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area.  Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and minor slow; the second dealing minor damage and major slow.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: naga_siren_mirror_image
abilities.title: Mirror Image
abilities.detail: Creates three images of Naga Siren under her control.

abilities.name: naga_siren_ensnare
abilities.title: Ensnare
abilities.detail: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.

abilities.name: naga_siren_rip_tide
abilities.title: Rip Tide
abilities.detail: The Naga Siren and her images hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: naga_siren_song_of_the_siren
abilities.title: Song of the Siren
abilities.detail: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.

abilities.name: naga_siren_song_of_the_siren_cancel
abilities.title: Song of the Siren Cancel
abilities.detail: Release enemy units from your song so they can be targeted again.

abilities.name: lone_druid_spirit_bear
abilities.title: Summon Spirit Bear
abilities.detail: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items.  If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack.  If the Spirit Bear dies, the Lone Druid suffers composite damage as backlash.  As the bear increases in levels, it can learn the Return, Entangling Claws, and Demolish abilities.  Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.

abilities.name: lone_druid_rabid
abilities.title: Rabid
abilities.detail: Increases the attack and movement speed of Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear.

abilities.name: lone_druid_synergy
abilities.title: Synergy
abilities.detail: Increases the Lone Druid's synergy with his Spirit Bear and himself, upgrading attributes and abilities.

abilities.name: lone_druid_true_form_battle_cry
abilities.title: Battle Cry
abilities.detail: Adds damage and armor to the Lone Druid and his Spirit Bear.

abilities.name: lone_druid_true_form
abilities.title: True Form
abilities.detail: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage and some base movement speed, but gaining melee power as well as the Battle Cry ability.  He can morph freely between druid and bear form.

abilities.name: lone_druid_true_form_druid
abilities.title: Druid Form
abilities.detail: Return to Druid form.

abilities.name: troll_warlord_berserkers_rage
abilities.title: Berserker's Rage
abilities.detail: Allows the Warlord to use his throwing axes as melee weapons, gaining bonus damage, attack speed, movement speed, hitpoints, armor, and a chance to bash targets on attack.  Berserker's Rage also changes the functionality of Whirling Axes.

abilities.name: troll_warlord_whirling_axes_ranged
abilities.title: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
abilities.detail: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 900 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.

abilities.name: troll_warlord_whirling_axes_melee
abilities.title: Whirling Axes (Melee)
abilities.detail: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.

abilities.name: troll_warlord_fervor
abilities.title: Fervor
abilities.detail: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.

abilities.name: troll_warlord_battle_trance
abilities.title: Battle Trance
abilities.detail: Troll's presence on the battlefield increases the attack speed of himself and all allied heroes.

abilities.name: puck_illusory_orb
abilities.title: Illusory Orb
abilities.detail: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.

abilities.name: puck_waning_rift
abilities.title: Waning Rift
abilities.detail: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.

abilities.name: puck_phase_shift
abilities.title: Phase Shift
abilities.detail: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.

abilities.name: puck_ethereal_jaunt
abilities.title: Ethereal Jaunt
abilities.detail: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.

abilities.name: puck_dream_coil
abilities.title: Dream Coil
abilities.detail:
Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for .5 seconds and damaging them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, deals damage again and stuns.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: crystal_maiden_crystal_nova
abilities.title: Crystal Nova
abilities.detail: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.

abilities.name: crystal_maiden_frostbite
abilities.title: Frostbite
abilities.detail: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.

abilities.name: crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura
abilities.title: Arcane Aura
abilities.detail: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.

abilities.name: crystal_maiden_freezing_field
abilities.title: Freezing Field
abilities.detail:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 7 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: storm_spirit_static_remnant
abilities.title: Static Remnant
abilities.detail: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.

abilities.name: storm_spirit_electric_vortex
abilities.title: Electric Vortex
abilities.detail: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: storm_spirit_overload
abilities.title: Overload
abilities.detail: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: storm_spirit_ball_lightning
abilities.title: Ball Lightning
abilities.detail: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The mana activation cost is 15+7% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10+1% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

abilities.name: zuus_arc_lightning
abilities.title: Arc Lightning
abilities.detail: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: zuus_lightning_bolt
abilities.title: Lightning Bolt
abilities.detail: Summons a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. Lightning Bolt also provides True Sight around the target in a radius of 900.

abilities.name: zuus_static_field
abilities.title: Static Field
abilities.detail: Zeus shocks all nearby enemy units whenever he casts a spell, causing damage proportional to their current health.

abilities.name: zuus_thundergods_wrath
abilities.title: Thundergod's Wrath
abilities.detail:
Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: windrunner_shackleshot
abilities.title: Shackleshot
abilities.detail: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75.

abilities.name: windrunner_powershot
abilities.title: Powershot
abilities.detail: Windrunner charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot. The arrow deals damage to enemy units and destroys trees in its path. Damage is greatest on first target, and reduces by 10% for each target it pierces thereafter.  If the channeling is cancelled early, the shot will still occur but deal less damage.

abilities.name: windrunner_windrun
abilities.title: Windrun
abilities.detail: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.

abilities.name: windrunner_focusfire
abilities.title: Focus Fire
abilities.detail:
Windrunner channels the wind, gaining maximum attack speed on the enemy unit or structure, although with reduced damage, including damage from Unique Attack Modifiers and item effects.  Lasts 20 seconds.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: lina_dragon_slave
abilities.title: Dragon Slave
abilities.detail: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.

abilities.name: lina_light_strike_array
abilities.title: Light Strike Array
abilities.detail: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.

abilities.name: lina_fiery_soul
abilities.title: Fiery Soul
abilities.detail: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 7 seconds.

abilities.name: lina_laguna_blade
abilities.title: Laguna Blade
abilities.detail:
Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: tinker_laser
abilities.title: Laser
abilities.detail: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target for 3 seconds, causing it to miss all physical attacks.

abilities.name: tinker_heat_seeking_missile
abilities.title: Heat-Seeking Missile
abilities.detail: Launches a pair of rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500 range.

abilities.name: tinker_march_of_the_machines
abilities.title: March of the Machines
abilities.detail: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.

abilities.name: tinker_rearm
abilities.title: Rearm
abilities.detail: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.

abilities.name: shadow_shaman_ether_shock
abilities.title: Ether Shock
abilities.detail: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.

abilities.name: shadow_shaman_voodoo
abilities.title: Hex
abilities.detail: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.

abilities.name: shadow_shaman_shackles
abilities.title: Shackles
abilities.detail: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.

abilities.name: shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward
abilities.title: Mass Serpent Ward
abilities.detail:
Summons 10 serpent wards to attack enemy units and structures. The wards are immune to magic, and have a small area of splash damage that increases per level.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: enchantress_untouchable
abilities.title: Untouchable
abilities.detail: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.  Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: enchantress_enchant
abilities.title: Enchant
abilities.detail: Enchantress charms an enemy, bringing it under her control (if a creep) or slowing it (if a hero).

abilities.name: enchantress_natures_attendants
abilities.title: Nature's Attendants
abilities.detail: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby.  Lasts 10 seconds.

abilities.name: enchantress_impetus
abilities.title: Impetus
abilities.detail:
Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.

Impetus is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: jakiro_dual_breath
abilities.title: Dual Breath
abilities.detail: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.

abilities.name: jakiro_ice_path
abilities.title: Ice Path
abilities.detail: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.

abilities.name: jakiro_liquid_fire
abilities.title: Liquid Fire
abilities.detail: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.

abilities.name: jakiro_macropyre
abilities.title: Macropyre
abilities.detail:
Jakiro lays down a line of flame in front of him, each dealing damage per second to enemy units in a wide area of effect.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: furion_sprout
abilities.title: Sprout
abilities.detail: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.

abilities.name: furion_teleportation
abilities.title: Teleportation
abilities.detail: Teleports to any point on the map.

abilities.name: furion_force_of_nature
abilities.title: Nature's Call
abilities.detail: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.

abilities.name: furion_wrath_of_nature
abilities.title: Wrath of Nature
abilities.detail:
Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: chen_penitence
abilities.title: Penitence
abilities.detail: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.

abilities.name: chen_test_of_faith
abilities.title: Test of Faith
abilities.detail: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.

abilities.name: chen_test_of_faith_teleport
abilities.title: Test of Faith
abilities.detail: Teleports a friendly unit back to the base.  Creeps are teleported instantly, Heroes have a delay before teleporting.

abilities.name: chen_holy_persuasion
abilities.title: Holy Persuasion
abilities.detail: Gives control of an enemy or neutral creep, and gives it bonus hit points.

abilities.name: chen_hand_of_god
abilities.title: Hand of God
abilities.detail:
Fully regenerates any creeps under Chen's control and heals all allied heroes on the map.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_fireblast
abilities.title: Fireblast
abilities.detail: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_ignite
abilities.title: Ignite
abilities.detail: Drenches a target in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_bloodlust
abilities.title: Bloodlust
abilities.detail: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_unrefined_fireblast
abilities.title: Unrefined Fireblast
abilities.detail: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_multicast
abilities.title: Multicast
abilities.detail:
Enables the Ogre Magi to rapidly cast his spells, giving them greater potency. Gives a chance to cast a spell multiple times in one cast. Increases Fireblast's mana cost and decreases its cooldown, adds an area of effect to Ignite and reduces Bloodlust's cooldown and gives it a chance to cast on random allies around Ogre Magi.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: silencer_curse_of_the_silent
abilities.title: Curse of the Silent
abilities.detail: Curses the target area, causing enemy Heroes to take damage and lose mana until they cast a spell.

abilities.name: silencer_glaives_of_wisdom
abilities.title: Glaives of Wisdom
abilities.detail:
Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. 

Glaives of Wisdom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: silencer_last_word
abilities.title: Last Word
abilities.detail: Enchants a target damaging and silencing them if they cast a spell. If the enchantment expires the target will be disarmed in addition to being damaged and silenced.

abilities.name: silencer_global_silence
abilities.title: Global Silence
abilities.detail:
Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: disruptor_thunder_strike
abilities.title: Thunder Strike
abilities.detail: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius.

abilities.name: disruptor_glimpse
abilities.title: Glimpse
abilities.detail: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions.

abilities.name: disruptor_kinetic_field
abilities.title: Kinetic Field
abilities.detail: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.

abilities.name: disruptor_static_storm
abilities.title: Static Storm
abilities.detail:
Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: rubick_telekinesis
abilities.title: Telekinesis
abilities.detail: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.

abilities.name: rubick_telekinesis_land
abilities.title: Telekinesis Land
abilities.detail: Chooses the location the target will land when Telekinesis finishes.

abilities.name: rubick_fade_bolt
abilities.title: Fade Bolt
abilities.detail: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage.  Each jump deals less damage.

abilities.name: rubick_null_field
abilities.title: Null Field
abilities.detail: Rubick's mastery of the arcane protects his allies against weaker magics, granting them magic resistance.

abilities.name: rubick_spell_steal
abilities.title: Spell Steal
abilities.detail:
Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_illuminate
abilities.title: Illuminate
abilities.detail: Channels a ball of light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, the ball deals damage and gives vision in a line.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage dealt.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_mana_leak
abilities.title: Mana Leak
abilities.detail: Weakens an enemy's magical essence, causing them to lose mana as they move.  If the enemy loses all of its mana, it will be stunned.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic
abilities.title: Chakra Magic
abilities.detail: Restores mana to the target unit.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_recall
abilities.title: Recall
abilities.detail: After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location.  If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light
abilities.title: Blinding Light
abilities.detail: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss attacks.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form
abilities.title: Spirit Form
abilities.detail: Ezalor turns his body luminescent temporarily, gaining various abilities.  Illuminate is now channeled by a separate spirit, and gains the Blinding Light and Recall abilities.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_illuminate_end
abilities.title: Release Illuminate
abilities.detail: Release the channel early.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form_illuminate
abilities.title: Illuminate
abilities.detail: Channels a ball of light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, the ball deals damage and gives vision in a line.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage dealt.

abilities.name: skywrath_mage_arcane_bolt
abilities.title: Arcane Bolt
abilities.detail: Skywrath launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath's intelligence.

abilities.name: skywrath_mage_concussive_shot
abilities.title: Concussive Shot
abilities.detail: Skywrath sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.

abilities.name: skywrath_mage_ancient_seal
abilities.title: Ancient Seal
abilities.detail: Skywrath seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.

abilities.name: skywrath_mage_mystic_flare
abilities.title: Mystic Flare
abilities.detail:
Skywrath uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: pudge_meat_hook
abilities.title: Meat Hook
abilities.detail: Launches a bloody hook at a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.

abilities.name: pudge_rot
abilities.title: Rot
abilities.detail: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

abilities.name: pudge_flesh_heap
abilities.title: Flesh Heap
abilities.detail: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.

abilities.name: pudge_dismember
abilities.title: Dismember
abilities.detail:
CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: axe_berserkers_call
abilities.title: Berserker's Call
abilities.detail: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

abilities.name: axe_battle_hunger
abilities.title: Battle Hunger
abilities.detail: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.

abilities.name: axe_counter_helix
abilities.title: Counter Helix
abilities.detail: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: axe_culling_blade
abilities.title: Culling Blade
abilities.detail:
Axe spots weakness and strikes, dealing moderate damage but instantly killing an enemy unit with low health.  When an enemy hero is killed in this way, the cooldown is reset and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: sandking_burrowstrike
abilities.title: Burrowstrike
abilities.detail: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.

abilities.name: sandking_sand_storm
abilities.title: Sand Storm
abilities.detail: CHANNELED - Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The invisibility remains for a short duration after the sandstorm ends.

abilities.name: sandking_caustic_finale
abilities.title: Caustic Finale
abilities.detail:
Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to explode violently upon death, spreading area damage.

Caustic Finale is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.

abilities.name: sandking_epicenter
abilities.title: Epicenter
abilities.detail:
CHANNELED - After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: slardar_sprint
abilities.title: Sprint
abilities.detail: Slardar moves significantly faster, but takes bonus damage.

abilities.name: slardar_slithereen_crush
abilities.title: Slithereen Crush
abilities.detail: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

abilities.name: slardar_bash
abilities.title: Bash
abilities.detail: Grants a chance that an attack will do bonus damage and stun an enemy.  The duration is doubled against creeps.

abilities.name: slardar_amplify_damage
abilities.title: Amplify Damage
abilities.detail: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.

abilities.name: tidehunter_gush
abilities.title: Gush
abilities.detail: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 4 seconds.

abilities.name: tidehunter_kraken_shell
abilities.title: Kraken Shell
abilities.detail:
Creates a thick armor shell that reduces physical damage and removes negative buffs when damage received reaches a critical threshold.

Kraken Shell does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

abilities.name: tidehunter_anchor_smash
abilities.title: Anchor Smash
abilities.detail: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to damage nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

abilities.name: tidehunter_ravage
abilities.title: Ravage
abilities.detail: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: skeleton_king_hellfire_blast
abilities.title: Hellfire Blast
abilities.detail: Skeleton King fires a sphere of hellfire at an enemy unit, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.

abilities.name: skeleton_king_vampiric_aura
abilities.title: Vampiric Aura
abilities.detail: Nearby friendly units gain hit points based on their damage dealt when attacking enemy units.

abilities.name: skeleton_king_mortal_strike
abilities.title: Mortal Strike
abilities.detail: Skeleton King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack.

abilities.name: skeleton_king_reincarnation
abilities.title: Reincarnation
abilities.detail: Skeleton King's bones reform after death, causing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in the area will be slowed by 50%.

abilities.name: night_stalker_void
abilities.title: Void
abilities.detail: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage.  Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities. The slowing effect lasts longer at night.

abilities.name: night_stalker_crippling_fear
abilities.title: Crippling Fear
abilities.detail: Night Stalker horrifies the target enemy Hero, causing it to miss attacks and become silenced.  The effect lasts longer at night.

abilities.name: night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night
abilities.title: Hunter in the Night
abilities.detail: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.

abilities.name: night_stalker_darkness
abilities.title: Darkness
abilities.detail:
Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest.  When used at night, it extends night time by Darkness' duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter. Causes enemy vision to be reduced by 25%.

abilities.name: life_stealer_rage
abilities.title: Rage
abilities.detail: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming immune to magic spells and gaining increased attack speed.

abilities.name: life_stealer_feast
abilities.title: Feast
abilities.detail: Regenerates a portion of the attacked enemy's current HP and deals the same portion of damage per attack.

abilities.name: life_stealer_open_wounds
abilities.title: Open Wounds
abilities.detail: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movespeed and allowing all allies to lifesteal on that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.

abilities.name: life_stealer_infest
abilities.title: Infest
abilities.detail: Lifestealer will infest the body of the target unit, lying dormant and undetectable inside. When he reveals himself, he deals damage to all nearby enemy units. If the unit is a creep, he will devour it first, gaining health equal to the unit's current HP.  Does not work on enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: life_stealer_consume
abilities.title: Consume
abilities.detail: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out.

abilities.name: doom_bringer_devour
abilities.title: Devour
abilities.detail: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed.

abilities.name: doom_bringer_scorched_earth
abilities.title: Scorched Earth
abilities.detail: Carpets the nearby earth in flames, damaging enemies while Doom gains bonus HP regen and increased movement speed.

abilities.name: doom_bringer_lvl_death
abilities.title: LVL? Death
abilities.detail: Dissipates a piece of an enemy Hero's soul, mini-stunning and dealing bonus damage equal to 20% of the target's maximum health when the enemy's level is a multiple of a specific number or 25.

abilities.name: doom_bringer_doom
abilities.title: Doom
abilities.detail:
Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.  Doom also disables most passive abilities and removes positive buffs on cast. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: lycan_summon_wolves
abilities.title: Summon Wolves
abilities.detail: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycanthrope.  Level 2-4 wolves have Critical Strike, and level 4 wolves have permanent invisibility.

abilities.name: lycan_howl
abilities.title: Howl
abilities.detail: Grants bonus damage to Lycanthrope, all allied heroes and all units under their control.

abilities.name: lycan_feral_impulse
abilities.title: Feral Impulse
abilities.detail: Increases the damage and attack speed of Lycanthrope and all units under his control.

abilities.name: lycan_shapeshift
abilities.title: Shapeshift
abilities.detail: Lycanthrope assumes his true form, increasing his combat capabilities.  During Shapeshift, Lycanthrope and all units under his control move at maximum speed and cannot be slowed.

abilities.name: spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness
abilities.title: Charge of Darkness
abilities.detail: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.

abilities.name: spirit_breaker_empowering_haste
abilities.title: Empowering Haste
abilities.detail: Causes the Spirit Breaker to gain power with higher movement speed. His presence increases the movement speed of nearby allied units.

abilities.name: spirit_breaker_greater_bash
abilities.title: Greater Bash
abilities.detail: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack, as well as gaining bonus movement speed after a bash occurs. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.

abilities.name: spirit_breaker_nether_strike
abilities.title: Nether Strike
abilities.detail:
Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: chaos_knight_chaos_bolt
abilities.title: Chaos Bolt
abilities.detail: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

abilities.name: chaos_knight_reality_rift
abilities.title: Reality Rift
abilities.detail: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Gives you bonus attack damage for one attack.

abilities.name: chaos_knight_chaos_strike
abilities.title: Chaos Strike
abilities.detail: Chaos Knight's mojo gives him a chance to deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: chaos_knight_phantasm
abilities.title: Phantasm
abilities.detail: Summons several copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The illusions deal full damage, but take double damage.

abilities.name: undying_decay
abilities.title: Decay
abilities.detail: Undying saps the life from enemy Heroes in an area, dealing damage and stealing Strength for the duration.

abilities.name: undying_soul_rip
abilities.title: Soul Rip
abilities.detail: Redirects the flow of energy through a target friendly or enemy unit, healing or damaging it depending on how many units are near Undying.  Each counted unit takes damage.

abilities.name: undying_tombstone
abilities.title: Tombstone
abilities.detail: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.

abilities.name: undying_flesh_golem
abilities.title: Flesh Golem
abilities.detail:
Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem that possesses a Plague Aura.  This aura slows all enemy units within 750 range and amplifies the damage they take; the closer to Undying, the more damage.  When a plagued unit dies, Undying is healed equal to a percentage of that unit's maximum health.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: magnataur_shockwave
abilities.title: Shockwave
abilities.detail: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.

abilities.name: magnataur_empower
abilities.title: Empower
abilities.detail: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.

abilities.name: magnataur_skewer
abilities.title: Skewer
abilities.detail: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk.  Units hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and slowed.

abilities.name: magnataur_reverse_polarity
abilities.title: Reverse Polarity
abilities.detail: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.

abilities.name: abaddon_death_coil
abilities.title: Mist Coil
abilities.detail: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.

abilities.name: abaddon_aphotic_shield
abilities.title: Aphotic Shield
abilities.detail: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.

abilities.name: abaddon_frostmourne
abilities.title: Curse of Avernus
abilities.detail: Abaddon strikes an enemy with chilling curse on each attack, causing all units who attack the slowed enemy to gain increased movement speed, along with faster attack speed, for a limited time.

abilities.name: abaddon_borrowed_time
abilities.title: Borrowed Time
abilities.detail:
When activated, most negative buffs will be removed and any damage you take will heal instead of damaging you. If the ability is not in cooldown, it will passively activate when your hitpoints drop below a certain threshold.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: nevermore_shadowraze1
abilities.title: Shadowraze
abilities.detail: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.

abilities.name: nevermore_necromastery
abilities.title: Necromastery
abilities.detail: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. If the killed unit is a hero, he gains 12 souls.  On death, he releases half of them from bondage.

abilities.name: nevermore_dark_lord
abilities.title: Presence of the Dark Lord
abilities.detail: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.

abilities.name: nevermore_requiem
abilities.title: Requiem of Souls
abilities.detail: Captured souls are used to deal massive damage, as well as slowing and reducing the attack damage of nearby enemy units. Requiem of Souls creates one wave of damage for every 2 souls stored by Necromastery.  The closest enemy units are hit the hardest.  Requiem has a 1 second cast time before it is activated.  Requiem of Souls is automatically cast when Shadow Fiend dies, independent of its cooldown.

abilities.name: bloodseeker_bloodrage
abilities.title: Bloodrage
abilities.detail: Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage, during which it has higher attack damage, but cannot cast spells and takes damage every second.  Bloodrage dispels the target before applying its buff.

abilities.name: bloodseeker_blood_bath
abilities.title: Blood Bath
abilities.detail: Bloodseeker revels in combat, gaining health with every unit he kills.  The health gained is a percentage of the killed unit's maximum HP.  If a hero dies within a radius of 325 of Bloodseeker and he is not the killer, he is healed for half the normal hero kill effect.

abilities.name: bloodseeker_thirst
abilities.title: Thirst
abilities.detail: Enables Bloodseeker to sense enemy Heroes with health below a certain percentage, giving him vision of that unit, increased movement speed and increased damage. Bonuses stack per Hero.  Bloodseeker gains True Sight of enemy heroes below half their visiblity threshold.

abilities.name: bloodseeker_rupture
abilities.title: Rupture
abilities.detail: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing massive damage. If the unit moves while under the effect of Rupture, it takes a percentage of the distance traveled as damage.

abilities.name: razor_plasma_field
abilities.title: Plasma Field
abilities.detail: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage increases with distance from Razor.

abilities.name: razor_static_link
abilities.title: Static Link
abilities.detail: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor.

abilities.name: razor_unstable_current
abilities.title: Unstable Current
abilities.detail: As Razor moves with increased speed, any abilites targeted on him are countered with an instant jolt of damaging and slowing electricity.

abilities.name: razor_eye_of_the_storm
abilities.title: Eye of the Storm
abilities.detail:
A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: venomancer_venomous_gale
abilities.title: Venomous Gale
abilities.detail: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.

abilities.name: venomancer_poison_sting
abilities.title: Poison Sting
abilities.detail: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: venomancer_plague_ward
abilities.title: Plague Ward
abilities.detail: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from your hero.

abilities.name: venomancer_poison_nova
abilities.title: Poison Nova
abilities.detail:
A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer.  Poison Nova's effect cannot bring units below 1 HP.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: faceless_void_time_walk
abilities.title: Time Walk
abilities.detail: Rushes to a target location while slowing the movement and attack speed of all enemies along its path for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: faceless_void_backtrack
abilities.title: Backtrack
abilities.detail: Faceless Void dodges damage by jumping backward in time, eluding both physical and magical attacks.

abilities.name: faceless_void_time_lock
abilities.title: Time Lock
abilities.detail: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.

abilities.name: faceless_void_chronosphere
abilities.title: Chronosphere
abilities.detail:
Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger
abilities.title: Stifling Dagger
abilities.detail: Deals minor pure damage and slows the enemy unit's movement speed. Deals half damage to heroes.

abilities.name: phantom_assassin_phantom_strike
abilities.title: Phantom Strike
abilities.detail: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.

abilities.name: phantom_assassin_blur
abilities.title: Blur
abilities.detail: The Phantom Assassin becomes hard to see by blurring her body and disappearing from the enemy minimap when near enemy heroes. Some enemy attacks miss.

abilities.name: phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace
abilities.title: Coup de Grace
abilities.detail: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.

abilities.name: clinkz_strafe
abilities.title: Strafe
abilities.detail: Clinkz attacks with a barrage of arrows.  Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time.

abilities.name: clinkz_searing_arrows
abilities.title: Searing Arrows
abilities.detail:
Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.

Searing Arrows is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: clinkz_wind_walk
abilities.title: Skeleton Walk
abilities.detail: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses an ability.

abilities.name: clinkz_death_pact
abilities.title: Death Pact
abilities.detail: Clinkz consumes the target friendly or enemy creep, gaining a percent of its hitpoints as max health and damage.

abilities.name: viper_poison_attack
abilities.title: Poison Attack
abilities.detail:
Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that slows attack and movement speed while dealing damage over time.

Poison Attack is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: viper_nethertoxin
abilities.title: Nethertoxin
abilities.detail: Nethertoxin causes Viper's normal attack to deal bonus damage to units based on how much health they are missing.  The bonus damage doubles for each 20% of health missing from the target.   Nethertoxin deals half damage to creeps and buildings.

abilities.name: viper_corrosive_skin
abilities.title: Corrosive Skin
abilities.detail: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows any enemy that damages it. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to spells.

abilities.name: viper_viper_strike
abilities.title: Viper Strike
abilities.detail:
Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: broodmother_spawn_spiderlings
abilities.title: Spawn Spiderlings
abilities.detail: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.

abilities.name: broodmother_spin_web
abilities.title: Spin Web
abilities.detail: Throws out a web that renders Broodmother invisible in its vicinity, while also boosting regeneration, and granting a passive movement speed increase.  Webs never expire, but when the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears. You have free movement capabilities while on the Web.

abilities.name: broodmother_incapacitating_bite
abilities.title: Incapacitating Bite
abilities.detail:
Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.

Incapacitating Bite is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: broodmother_insatiable_hunger
abilities.title: Insatiable Hunger
abilities.detail: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.

abilities.name: weaver_the_swarm
abilities.title: The Swarm
abilities.detail: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.

abilities.name: weaver_shukuchi
abilities.title: Shukuchi
abilities.detail: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.

abilities.name: weaver_geminate_attack
abilities.title: Geminate Attack
abilities.detail:
Allows Weaver to dispatch two swarms, attacking an enemy twice.

The extra attack will not trigger other attack effects (such as critical strike) and overrides Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: weaver_time_lapse
abilities.title: Time Lapse
abilities.detail: Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

abilities.name: spectre_spectral_dagger
abilities.title: Spectral Dagger
abilities.detail: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.

abilities.name: spectre_desolate
abilities.title: Desolate
abilities.detail: Deals bonus pure damage when Spectre attacks an enemy hero with no nearby allied units.

abilities.name: spectre_dispersion
abilities.title: Dispersion
abilities.detail: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

abilities.name: spectre_reality
abilities.title: Reality
abilities.detail: Spectre physically possesses a chosen Haunt.

abilities.name: spectre_haunt
abilities.title: Haunt
abilities.detail:
Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero after a short delay. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to take the place of a given illusion.

Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They move at 400 base movement speed and ignore terrain.

abilities.name: meepo_earthbind
abilities.title: Earthbind
abilities.detail: Tosses a net at the target point, pinning down all enemy units.  Earthbind prevents invisibility, blink, and interrupts channeling.

abilities.name: meepo_poof
abilities.title: Poof
abilities.detail: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, dealing damage in both the departure and arrival locations.

abilities.name: meepo_geostrike
abilities.title: Geostrike
abilities.detail: Meepo enchants his weapon to deal damage per second, as well as slow the movement speed of the attacked unit.  Geostrikes from multiple Meepos stack.

abilities.name: meepo_divided_we_stand
abilities.title: Divided We Stand
abilities.detail:
Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience and abilities.
